answers.c: information processing that relies heavily on familiar schemata
answers.d: processing that focuses on unusual or novel events

questions.question: Which of the following strategies would NOT be effective at improving your communication competence?

answers.a: Recognize the people, objects, and situations remain stable over time
answers.b: Recognize that each person frame of perception is unique

answers.a: we process, store, and retrieve information that we have already selected, organized, and interpreted
answers.b: we make choices to experience particular stimuli
answers.c: we make choices to avoid particular stimuli
answers.d: we focus on specific stimuli while ignoring other stimuli
